function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"People hoarding essential supplies such as toilet paper","Impact":"Shortage of essential supplies for others, leading to increased stress and panic","Mitigation":"Implement purchasing limits, educate the public on responsible buying behavior","Technologies":"Inventory tracking systems, online purchasing restrictions","People":"General public, essential workers","Owner":"Retailers, government"},{"Description":"Inability to gather in public spaces leading to new ways of social interaction","Impact":"Increased reliance on digital platforms and potential isolation from physical communities","Mitigation":"Support and promote safe outdoor gatherings, invest in digital infrastructure for inclusive participation","Technologies":"Outdoor event spaces, audio and video streaming platforms","People":"City residents, urban communities","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of representation of embodied sounds and communication in scholarly journals","Impact":"Neglect of the role of physical interaction and sound in urban environments","Mitigation":"Encourage multi-sensory representations of research, promote interdisciplinary studies","Technologies":"Audiovisual recording equipment, virtual reality simulations","People":"Researchers, urban scholars","Owner":"Academic institutions, publishing industry"}]}
